name: WRAL
0:
”Alexa, open w r a l.”
”Alexa, ask w r a l to play news.”
”Alexa, ask w r a l for the forecast.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: w. r. a. l.
des: Get the latest WRAL News, today's headlines, weather forecast, sports updates and radar directly from your favorite WRAL anchors and meteorologists through your Alexa-enabled devices. Get even more content for the triangle region of North Carolina from WRAL's team of expert meteorologists.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
